fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Copy a target's defense during the night. You will copy their defense tier and any protective effects they had tonight. You will not be informed about your new Defense tier, if any, and any notifications from your copied protection will not be given to you. Any effect you copy will only last for the night you used this ability.
- **Intercept** a player during the night, take the attack instead of your target. You will also protect yourself with your most recent copy of protective effects.
